decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8c122e3b-7fff-2276-057b-248e432b0ab8"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed development, in the absence of a legal agreement to secure car-free housing, and in the absence of  cycle parking provision, would fail to promote sustainable modes of transport and would likely contribute to </span></span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> air pollution and congestion in the surrounding area, contrary to part MA,.2(2)(a) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-93cd665f-7fff-da49-b320-828e39b8aadf"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed development, by reason of  failing to demonstrate the provision of adequate natural light in habitable rooms is deemed contrary to MA.2(2)(f)&nbsp; of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). </span></span><br></p>
description: Prior Approval (Class MA) for a change of use from office (Class E) to 1 bedroom residential unit (Class C3).
